00019 #ifndef _IIR_DESIGN_HPP_cm131126_
00020 #define _IIR_DESIGN_HPP_cm131126_
00021 
00022 #include <complex>
00023 #include <cmath>
00024 #include <map>
00025 #include <utility>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 namespace filter {
00029   namespace detail {
00030     class delta {
00031     public:
00032       typedef std::vector<double> vector_type;
00033       
00034       typedef std::pair<int, std::pair<int, int> > val_type;
00035       typedef std::map<val_type, double> coeff_map_type;
00036       typedef std::map<std::pair<int,double>, double> omega_map_type;
00037       
00038       delta(double x0,
00039             const vector_type& alpha)
00040         : x0_(x0)
00041         , alpha_(alpha) {}
00042 
00043       const vector_type& alpha() const { return alpha_; }
00044       
00045       double coeff(int m, int n, int nu) const {
00046         const val_type val(std::make_pair(m,std::make_pair(n,nu)));
00047         coeff_map_type::const_iterator i(coeff_map_.find(val));
00048         if (i != coeff_map_.end())
00049           return i->second;
00050         if (m==0 && n==0 && nu==0)
00051           return (coeff_map_[val]=
00052                   1.);
00053         if (m<0 || nu<0 || n<0)
00054           return 0.;
00055         if (nu < n) {
00056           return (coeff_map_[val]=
00057                   1/(alpha_[n]-alpha_[nu]) * 
00058                   ((alpha_[n]-x0_)*coeff(m,n-1,nu) - m*coeff(m-1,n-1,nu)));
00059         } else { // n ==nu
00060           if (n==0) return 0;
00061           return (coeff_map_[val]= 
00062                   omega(n-2, alpha_[n-1])/omega(n-1, alpha_[n]) *
00063                   (m*coeff(m-1,n-1,n-1) - (alpha_[n-1]-x0_)*coeff(m,n-1,n-1)));
00064         }
00065       }
00066 
00067     protected:
00068       double omega(int n, double x) const {
00069         const std::pair<int,double> val(std::make_pair(n,x));
00070         omega_map_type::const_iterator i(omega_map_.find(val));
00071         if (i != omega_map_.end())
00072           return i->second;
00073         double w(1);
00074         for (int k(0); k<n+1; ++k)
00075           w *= (x-alpha_[k]);
00076         return (omega_map_[val]=
00077                 w);
00078       }
00079     private:
00080       double      x0_;
00081       vector_type alpha_;
00082       mutable coeff_map_type coeff_map_;
00083       mutable omega_map_type omega_map_;
00084     } ;
00085   }
00086 
00087   // butterworth poles
00088   class iir_coefficients {
00089   public:
00090     typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00091     typedef std::vector<double> vector_type;
00092     iir_coefficients(size_t order)
00093     : order_(order) {}
00094 
00095     size_t order() const { return order_; }
00096 
00097     double eval(double s) const {
00098 #if 1
00099       double p(1);
00100       for (size_t n(0); n<order_/2; ++n)
00101         p *= (s*s + 2*s*std::sin(M_PI*double(int(2*n)+1)/double(2*order_)) + 1.);
00102       if ((order_ % 2) == 1)
00103         p *= (s+1);
00104       return p;
00105 #else
00106       complex_type p(1,0);
00107       for (size_t n(0); n<order_; ++n)
00108         p *= (s - std::exp(M_PI*complex_type(0, double(2*n+1+order_)/double(2*order_))));
00109       return p.real();
00110 #endif
00111     }
00112 
00113   protected:
00114   private:
00115     size_t order_;
00116   } ;
00117 
00118   class iir_design_base {
00119   public:
00120     typedef std::vector<double> vector_type;
00121   
00122     iir_design_base(size_t order) // filter order
00123     : iir_coefficients_(order)
00124     , delta_(0, make_alpha(order)) {}
00125 
00126     virtual ~iir_design_base() {}
00127 
00128     size_t order() const { return iir_coefficients_.order(); }
00129 
00130     const vector_type a() const { return a_; }
00131     const vector_type b() const { return b_; }
00132 
00133   protected:
00134     // zi = z^{-1}
00135     // H(zi) = p(zi) / q(zi)
00136     virtual double p(double zi) const = 0;
00137     virtual double q(double zi) const = 0;
00138 
00139     bool design(size_t ord) { // filter order
00140       if (ord != order()) {
00141         iir_coefficients_ = iir_coefficients(ord);
00142         delta_            = detail::delta(0, make_alpha(ord));
00143       }
00144       a_ = compute_a();
00145       b_ = compute_b();
00146       const double norm(a_[0]);
00147       for (size_t i(0), n(order()+1); i<n; ++i) {
00148         a_[i] /= norm;
00149         b_[i] /= norm;
00150       }
00151       return true;
00152     }
00153 
00154     vector_type compute_a() const {
00155       vector_type as;
00156       const double dx(1/sqrt(17));
00157       double f(1);
00158       for (int j(0), n(order()+1); j<n; ++j) {
00159         f *= (j>1) ? j : 1;
00160         f *= (j>0) ? dx : 1;
00161         double sum(0);
00162         for (size_t i(0), n(2*order()+1); i<n; ++i)
00163           sum += q(dx*delta_.alpha()[i]) * delta_.coeff(j,2*order(), i);
00164         as.push_back(sum/f);
00165       }
00166       return as;
00167     }
00168     vector_type compute_b() const {
00169       vector_type bs;
00170       const double dx(1/sqrt(17));
00171       double f(1);
00172       for (int j(0), n(order()+1); j<n; ++j) {
00173         f *= (j>1) ? j : 1;
00174         f *= (j>0) ? dx : 1;
00175         double sum(0);
00176         for (size_t i(0), n(2*order()+1); i<n; ++i)
00177           sum += p(dx*delta_.alpha()[i]) * delta_.coeff(j,2*order(), i);
00178         bs.push_back(sum/f);
00179       }
00180       return bs;
00181     }
00182 
00183     iir_coefficients iir_coefficients_;
00184 
00185   private:
00186     static detail::delta::vector_type make_alpha(int N) {
00187       detail::delta::vector_type alpha(2*N+1, 0.);
00188       for (int i(-N); i<N+1; ++i)
00189         alpha[i+N] = double(i);
00190       return alpha;
00191     }
00192     detail::delta    delta_;
00193     vector_type      a_;
00194     vector_type      b_;
00195   } ;
00196 
00197   class iir_design_lowpass : public iir_design_base {
00198   public:
00199     iir_design_lowpass(size_t order)
00200     : iir_design_base(order)
00201     , omega_(0) {}
00202     virtual ~iir_design_lowpass() {}
00203 
00204     bool design(size_t order, // filter order
00205                 double f) {   // normalized cutoff frequency
00206       omega_ = std::tan(M_PI*f/2);
00207       return iir_design_base::design(order);
00208     }
00209     
00210   protected:
00211     virtual double p(double zi) const {
00212       return std::pow((1+zi), int(order()));
00213     }
00214     virtual double q(double zi) const {
00215       return iir_coefficients_.eval((1-zi)/(1+zi)/omega_)*p(zi);
00216     }
00217   private:
00218     double omega_;
00219   } ;
00220 } // namespace filter
